arts.ttl: Ryan Johnson’s own goal gives Luton late victory against AFC Wimbledon
arts.sum: A desperate own goal five minutes from time by Wimbledon’s Ryan Johnson may be the slice of good fortune Luton need after back-to-back relegations. “We were due a bit of luck,” Matt Bloomfield, the Luton manager, said. “We feel like certain things have gone against us over a certain period of time but the one thing you cannot do is whine about it. Continue reading...

arts.sum: LTFC vs AFCW - The72's writers offer their Luton Town vs AFC Wimbledon prediction ahead of the League One on Friday night. The post ‘Out to make a statement’ – Luton Town vs AFC Wimbledon prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
